message: Is this shared any way to the conference list?  Might we suggest to do so?
Yes, once I get the tutorial talk links created, I will post on scipy-user, numpy and, ETS lists
Check out the events page for details on tomorrow and Thursday morning's run: http://conference.scipy.org/scipy2011/events.php

If anyone needs a ride to the event at Enthought offices from the AT&T Conf. Center, I have room for a few more in my car -- meet me in the (upper) lobby at ~6:40 (leaving at 6:50).  I think someone's marshaling a hotel van for the same purpose.
@tvaught  Could you give me a ride? :D
Hmm... not happy about statsmodels and Global Array Toolkit being scheduled at the same time....  Oh, well.   Good things the videos will be available.
Sign up for rooms for BoFs at the registration desk!
GitHub question: does a person need to "watch" a repository in order to get pull requests e-mailed to you?
You may have to actually be a member of the repository.
Don't forget to strut your genius... Fill out the yellow PiCloud "IQ Test" for a chance to win an xbox! Pick them up or turn them in at the registration desk.
Hi all — Please meet up at the registration desk after Lightning Talks for a group photo!
